Title: Establishes a municipal group insurance technical assistance program
Summary: Establishes a municipal group insurance technical assistance program for the purpose of assisting persons and municipalities with access to indemnity insurance and employee compensation pursuant to the volunteer firefighter's benefit law.
LawCode: Add ยง34, Vol Ffs Ben L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, in relation to establishing a municipal group insurance technical assistance program
